Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'computer security' targeting readability level Middle School. Limit the output to 100 words. A computer needs to stay safe from bad guys who want to steal or mess up your data. This is called computer security. To keep your computer safe, use strong passwords and update your computer's software regularly. Also, be careful where you click online, and never give out your password to someone you don't know.
